Class StandardDialog

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.control.Dialog<Void>
no.ntnu.idatt1005.foodi.view.components.dialog.StandardDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.event.EventTarget, ComponentUtils, DialogComponentUtils
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddIngredientsExpirationDialog, AddItemDialog, InvalidInputDialog, NewUserDialog
public class StandardDialog extends javafx.scene.control.Dialog<Void> implements DialogComponentUtils
Class for creating a dialog for adding a new user.
Author:
Henrik Kvamme

      public void setOkAction(@NotNull @NotNull ResultHandler action)
      Sets the action to be performed when the OK button is clicked. If the action throws a ValidationException, an InvalidInputDialog will be shown.
      Parameters:
      action - The action to be performed
